mapper.select: SELECT county, street, community_name, question_table.community_id, question_table.courtName, question_table.buildNumber, ST_ASGEOJSON(question_table.geom) geom, report_year, build_time from (select c.community_id as community_id, court_name as courtName, build_number as buildNumber, geom, report_year from indicator_value_build left join community c on indicator_value_build.community_id = c.community_id where c.city = #{city} and c.province = #{province} and indicator_id like '${indicator}%' and indicator_value > 0 and report_year = #{year} group by c.community_id, court_name, build_number, geom, report_year having count(indicator_value) > 0) question_table left join community on community.community_id = question_table.commuityId LEFT join (select community_id, court_name, build_number, build_time from build_basic where 1 = 1) build_basic on build_basic.community_id = community.community_id and question_table.courtName = build_basic.court_name and question_table.buildNumber = build_basic.build_number

select * from (select c.province,c.county ,c.community_name ,c.street,iv.community_id as communityId, sum(if(indicator_id='3.1.1.1',indicator_value,null)) as 3_1_1_1, sum(if(indicator_id='3.1.1.2',indicator_value,null)) as 3_1_1_2 from indicator_value iv left join community c on iv.community_id = c.community_id where c.city=#{city} and iv.report_year=#{year} and c.province=#{province} and indicator_id like '3.1.1.%' group by iv.community_id ,c.county ,c.community_name ,c.street,c.province) as t where t.3_1_1_1=0 or (t.3_1_1_1=1 and t.3_1_1_2=0)
